verses.verse: Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and he and all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out from Shittim <S%H7851><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and they lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> they crossed. <S%H5674><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> that the officers <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the camp; <S%H4264><s%>

and they commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When you see <S%H7200><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> it, then you shall set <S%H5265><s%> out from your place <S%H4725><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it.

"However, <S%H389><s%> there shall be between <S%H996><s%> you and it a distance <S%H7350><s%> of about 2000 cubits <S%H520><s%> by measure. <S%H4060><s%> Do not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> it, that you may know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> you shall go, <S%H1980><s%> for you have not passed <S%H5674><s%> this way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H4480><s%>. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>"

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Consecrate <S%H6942><s%> yourselves, for tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you."

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Take <S%H5375><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>" So they took <S%H5375><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> I will begin <S%H2490><s%> to exalt <S%H1431><s%> you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that just <S%H9201><s%> as I have been <S%H1961><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I will be with you.

"You shall, moreover, command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who are carrying <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'When you come <S%H935><s%> to the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> you shall stand <S%H5975><s%> [still] in the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>'"

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Come <S%H5066><s%> here, <S%H2008><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "By this <S%H2088><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, and that He will assuredly <S%H3423><s%> dispossess <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is crossing <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you into the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then, take <S%H3947><s%> for yourselves twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> from the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> for each <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> tribe. <S%H7626><s%>

"And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> shall rest <S%H5117><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off, <S%H3772><s%> [and] the waters <S%H4325><s%> which are flowing <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> heap. <S%H5067><s%>"

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the people <S%H5971><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out from their tents <S%H168><s%> to cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> with the priests <S%H3548><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>

and when those who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were dipped <S%H2881><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> (for the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> overflows <S%H4390><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its banks <S%H1415><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>),

that the waters <S%H4325><s%> which were flowing <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> [and] rose <S%H6965><s%> up in one <S%H259><s%> heap, <S%H5067><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> distance <S%H7368><s%> away at Adam, <S%H121><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> that is beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> Zarethan; <S%H6891><s%> and those which were flowing <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> were completely <S%H8552><s%> cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%> So the people <S%H5971><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> firm <S%H5975><s%> on dry <S%H2724><s%> ground <S%H2724><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> while all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> on dry <S%H2724><s%> ground, <S%H2724><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> had finished <S%H8552><s%> crossing <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
